snippet: As the third anniversary of Egypt’s 2011 uprising approaches, many activists who helped mobilize support for the sit-in that drove Hosni Mubarak from power are facing extended prison terms for daring to protest the new military-backed government.
abstract: As the third anniversary of Egypt’s 2011 uprising approaches, many activists who helped mobilize support for the sit-in that drove Hosni Mubarak from power are facing extended prison terms for daring to protest the new military-backed government.

headline.main: Egyptian Bloggers Who Mobilized Support for 2011 Uprising in Jail or Under Threat

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
